_sText:
race_highwaymadness_beta
INFOMap made by Biohazard.pt Hey guys, so here is my first (attempted) map in the rally race mod area. It gave me quite some headaches to finish it but I was happy that I did. Hope you enjoy playing it as much as I did making it (cough). This map was created for the portuguese FRAGXL community.
MAP INFOType: Rally Race Players: 16 max. - Earthquake - HDR lightning - 3D skybox - Sunny weather - Crazy ramps - 2 Laps
SCREENSHOT INFOScreenshot 1 - Start Zone Screenshot 2 - Map overview Screenshot 3 - The zig-zag turns Screenshot 4 - The famous Spiral Ramp Screenshot 5 - The gap Screenshot 6 - The booths
If you want to post this map on other forums go ahead but give me credit for my own map. Thanks go to Unreal, and Matador. Please feel free to rate, stamp or/and post some feedback.
